mapper.select: SELECT c.*, p.name as parent_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM material WHERE category_id = c.id) as material_count FROM category c LEFT JOIN category p ON c.parent_id = p.id WHERE c.id = #{id}

SELECT c.*, p.name as parent_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM material WHERE category_id = c.id) as material_count FROM category c LEFT JOIN category p ON c.parent_id = p.id WHERE c.status = 1 ORDER BY c.sort ASC, c.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category (name, parent_id, description, level, path, sort, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{parentId}, #{description}, #{level}, #{path}, #{sort}, #{status})
